text:
File:  docs/changelog.html

Text:  The directory from which to run the CVS 

Change "CVS"  to "svn"

creator: jan@materne.de
text:
I cant find a docs/changelog.html .... only a
docs\manual\CoreTasks\changelog.html which contains the documentation for
<cvschangelog>. And that task really needs a cvs client, not a svn.

Could you provide more information where the error should be?

The changelog.html file is located here:

http://svn.apache.org/viewvc/ant/antlibs/svn/trunk/docs/
